text: ٱشْتَرَوْا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنًا قَلِيلًا فَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ سَآءَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: They have exchanged the signs of Allah for a small price and averted [people] from His way. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.
translation.id.indonesian: Mereka menukarkan ayat-ayat Allah dengan harga yang sedikit, lalu mereka menghalangi (manusia) dari jalan Allah. Sesungguhnya amat buruklah apa yang mereka kerjakan itu.
